      Subinterfaces of SchemaReadCore in org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  SchemaRead
      Surface for getting schema information, such as fetching specific indexes or constraints.
      Methods in org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api that return SchemaReadCore 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SchemaReadCore SchemaRead.snapshot()
      Produce a snapshot of the current schema, which can be accessed without acquiring any schema locks.
